oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Jim Hurst and Friends - 2017-11-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Jim Hurst and Friends as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond series from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 11, 2017. Part 3 of 3. Jim Hurst band recording continued from file named part 2.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Hurst; Ben Hall; Dirk Johnson, Ric McClure and Rick Mauldin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Introduction of next song / (00:47) Performs Cannonball Rag (Jim Hurst and Ben Hall-guitars) / (02:43) Comments on Ben Hall / (03:05) Introduces next song / (03:25) Performs Noche Romantica / (07:35) Talks about Jerry Reed and introduces the next song / (08:24) Performs Swamp Reed / (11:43) Introduces the next song / (13:05) Performs A minor Infraction / (16:04) Interaction with the crowd and talks about Cotten Music Shop / (16:45) Introduces the next song / (18:07) Performs You Don't Know Me / (23:23) Performs Reed Between The Lines / (24:38) Final comments and band member shout out / (25:00) Walk-out music / (35:25) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hurst, Jim; Hall, Ben; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
